key_0.name: Grateful Dead
key_0.set1: Touch Of Gray-> Greatest Story Ever Told, Jack A Roe, Little Red Rooster, Stagger Lee, Queen Jane Approximately, The Last Time, Cassidy, Deal
key_0.set2: China Cat Sunflower-> I Know You Rider, A Little Light, Estimated Prophet-> Eyes Of The World-> Drums-> Jam-> The Wheel-> Gimme Some Lovin'-> Wharf Rat-> Sugar Magnolia, E: Knockin' On Heaven's Door

key_1.name: Grateful Dead
key_1.set1: Hell In A Bucket, Peggy-O, Walkin' Blues, Ramble On Rose, Just Like Tom Thumb's Blues, The Music Never Stopped-> Don't Ease Me In
key_1.set2: Scarlet Begonias-> Fire On The Mountain, Playin' In The Band-> Terrapin Station-> Drums-> Space-> I Need A Miracle-> Stella Blue-> Turn On Your Love Light, E: It's All Over Now Baby Blue

key_2.name: Grateful Dead
key_2.set1: Let The Good Times Roll, Feel Like A Stranger, Sugaree, Victim Or The Crime, Mississippi Half Step, When I Paint My Masterpiece, Bird Song
key_2.set2: Iko Iko*, Women Are Smarter*, Standing On the Moon, Truckin'-> Spoonful-> Drums-> Jam-> The Other One-> Morning Dew-> Throwing Stones-> Not Fade Away, E: We Bid You Good Night
key_2.comment: * with Michael Doucet fiddle and ?? banjo from Beausoleil

key_3.name: Grateful Dead
key_3.set1: Cold Rain & Snow Feel Like A Stranger Never Trust A Woman Mama Tried Big River Loose Lucy Stuck Insdie Of Mobile With The Memphis Blues Again Row Jimmy Let It Grow

key_4.name: Grateful Dead
key_4.set1: Jack Straw Sugaree Easy To Love You Walkin' Blues Althea Just Like Tom Thumb's Blues Tennessee Jed Cassidy Don't Ease Me In
key_4.comment: This date is featured on Terrapin Limited. Phil's 50th Birthday First Easy To Love You since September 3, 1980 First Revolution since November 8, 1985 Jerry Garcia - Guitar Bob Weir - Guitar Brent Mydland - Keyboards Phil Lesh - Bass Bill Kreutzmann - Drums Mickey Hart - Drums

key_5.name: Grateful Dead
key_5.set1: Let The Good Times Roll Touch Of Grey New Minglewood Blues Peggy-O Queen Jane Approximately Loser Black Throated Wind Bird Song Blow Away

key_6.name: Grateful Dead
key_6.set1: Shakedown Street, Little Red Rooster, Stagger Lee, Me & My Uncle-> Mexicali Blues, Friend Of The Devil, Just A Little Light, When I Paint My Masterpiece, Ramble On Rose, The Music Never Stopped
key_6.set2: Iko Iko, Looks Like Rain-> He's Gone-> Truckin'-> Spoonful-> Drums-> Jam-> The Wheel-> All Along The Watchtower-> Morning Dew, E: U.S. Blues

key_7.name: Grateful Dead
key_7.set1: Hell In A Bucket, Bertha, We Can Run But We Can't Hide, Jack A Roe, Picasso Moon, Brown Eyed Women, It's All Over Now, Deal
key_7.set2: Box Of Rain, Foolish Heart-> Playin' In The Band-> Eyes Of The World-> Jam-> Drums-> Jam-> China Doll-> Gimme Some Lovin'-> Goin' Down The Road Feelin' Bad-> Around & Around, E: Brokedown Palace

key_8.name: Grateful Dead
key_8.set1: Mississippi Half Step, Minglewood Blues, Far From Me, Queen Jane Approximately, Loose Lucy, Victim Or The Crime, Standing On the Moon, Promised Land

key_10.name: Grateful Dead
key_10.set1: Let The Good Times Roll, Help On The Way-> Slipknot!-> Franklin's Tower, Walkin' Blues, Loser, Desolation Row, Tennessee Jed, One More Saturday Night
key_10.set2: Playin' In The Band-> Uncle John's Band-> Terrapin Station-> Mind Left Body Jam-> Drums-> Space-> The Wheel-> All Along The Watchtower-> Stella Blue-> Not Fade Away, E: We Bid You Good Night
key_10.comment: This date is featured on Dozin' at the Knick.

key_11.name: Grateful Dead
key_11.set1: Greatest Story Ever Told, Touch Of Gray, Wang Dang Doodle, Good Time Blues, Jack A Roe, When I Paint My Masterpiece, Bird Song, Let It Grow

key_11.comment: This date is featured on Dozin' at the Knick.

key_12.name: Grateful Dead

key_14.set2: Eyes Of The World-> Estimated Prophet-> Dark Star-> Drums-> Dark Star-> The Wheel-> Throwing Stones-> Turn On Your Love Light, E: Knockin' On Heaven's Door
key_14.comment: * with Branford Marsalis on saxophones! Marsalis played throughout the second set and encore.

key_74.name: Grateful Dead
key_74.set1: Hell In A Bucket, Jack A Roe, Wang Dang Doodle, Row Jimmy, Mexicali Blues-> Big River, Bird Song*, Promised Land
key_74.set2: Not Fade Away-> Eyes Of The World-> Dark Star-> Drums-> Jam-> The Other One-> Wharf Rat-> Not Fade Away, E: The Weight, Johnny B. Goode
key_74.comment: Branford Marsalis performed on Bird Song > Promised on through 2nd set. Hamza El-Din performed during Drums. This show was an FM broadcast nationwide.

key_75.name: Grateful Dead
key_75.set1: Carib Jam > Spanish Lady Jam > Neal@TheWheel Jam > Faded Jam > Foolish Jam > Farewell Terrapin Jam > Playing In The Jam, pt. 1 > Going Home Jam > Bass Jam > Scarlet Jam > Bluesy Jam > Playing In The Jam, pt. 2 > Mind Left Body Jam
key_75.comment:
Track 1: 3.16.90 [sbd > ? > cdr > eac > shn] Jam into Drumz. This made a good starting point, because it had a 'hard start' as opposed to flowing out of another tune.
Track 2: 7.18.90 [S:DAT> C> DAT> CD> SHN] Jam out of Space into The Other One.
Track 3: 10.20.89 [Ultra-Matrix Soundboard DAT > Cassette > DAT > CDR] Jam out of The Other One into Drumz.
Track 4: 6.19.89 [SBD>DAT>CDR] Not Fade Away. This is the bridge from NFA, which is very non-standard: it is reminiscent of Foolish Heart.
Track 5: 6.8.90 [FOB Matrix SBD > DAT > CDR > WAV > SHN] Jam out of Foolish Heart into Drumz.
Track 6: 12.6.89 [SBD> Dat> Prodif Plus> Samplitude v6.0> SHN] Jam out of Terrapin Station into Drumz.
Track 7: 6.19.89 [SBD>DAT>CDR] Playing In The Band Reprise, out of Crazy Fingers and into Drumz.
Track 8: 7.16.90 [SBD> DAT> CD's> EAC> SHN] Jam out of Truckin' into Drumz.
Track 9: 3.19.90 [Pre-FM SBD Reel> DAT> CDRs> EAC> SHN] Jam out of Eyes Of The World into Drumz.
Track 10: 10.14.89 [Sbd> Cas(m)> Dat> ZA2/PC> SF> CD Architect> CDR?s] Jam out of Scarlet Begonias into Truckin'.
Track 11: 7.6.90 [SBD> Dat> Sonic Solutions> CD] Jam out of He's Gone into Drumz.
Track 12: 5.6.89 [DSBD by Jay Serafin] Playing Jam, out of Playing In The Band and into Eyes of the World.
Track 13: 3.24.90 [SBD > Dat x 3 > CDR > SHN] Mind Left Body Jam, out of Terrapin Station and into Drumz.

key_76.name: Grateful Dead
key_76.set1:
1990.03.18 Hartford Civic Center - Hartford, CT Shakedown Street Friend of the Devil
1990.03.21 Copps Coliseum - Hamilton, Ontario, Canada New Minglewood Blues Far From Me Cumberland Blues Estimated Prophet
1990.03.24 Knickerbocker Arena - Albany, NY Desolation Row
Disc 2: (78 Minutes)
1990.03.24 Knickerbocker Arena - Albany, NY Terrapin Station -> Mind Left Body Jam
1990.03.25 Knickerbocker Arena - Albany, NY Greatest Story Ever Told Never Trust a Women Samson and Delilah I Will Take You Home
1990.03.25 Knickerbocker Arena - Albany, NY Blow Away China Cat Sunflower -> I Know You Rider Dear Mr. Fantasy -> Gimme Some Lovin
key_76.set2:
Disc 3: (79 Minutes)
1990.03.29 Nassau Coliseum - Uniondale, NY Jack Straw We Can Run When I Paint My Masterpiece
1990.03.30 Nassau Coliseum - Uniondale, NY Help On the Way -> Slipknot! -> Franklins Tower Little Red Rooster Dire Wolf It's All Over Now
1990.04.01 The Omni - Atlanta, GA Big River China Cat Sunflower -> I Know You Rider Dear Mr. Fantasy -> Hey Jude!
Disc 4: (71 Minutes)
1990.04.02 The Omni - Atlanta, GA Feel Like a Stranger Queen Jane Approximately Easy To Love You The Other One -> Death Don't Have No Mercy -> Around and Around
1990.04.03 The Omni - Atlanta, GA Promised Land I Will Take You Home Feel Like a Stranger Hey Jude -> Dear Mr. Fantasy -> Hey Jude
key_76.comment:
Concept Notes: As you can see the tracks have been presented in chronological order. Belive it or not, this was pure happenstance. In listeing through the compilation myself I felt that the flow and order of the tracks is just superb, keeping the energy going where it is going, and slowly picking it up wherever needed. This is my first attempt at making a "Best Of" compilation, the entries that were chosen made me feel good, and allowed me to reach that place that we all love to get. With that being said, we all know whats left to do, download, burn and enjoy! The next volume/year/tour has not been decided yet, if you have any suggestions and/or tracks of which you feel should be nominated for the "Best Of Brent" project please either email me with your selection or send a pm to the user "Keysareme".
Email @ - keysareme@comcast.net (keysareme[at]comcast[dot]net)
On each disc except for disc three, there is room for some fillers, do with that space as you choose, and please feel free to let me know if I've missed something that must be included! Enjoy, and keep it lossless, keep it free, and stay in the groove of life.
-keys (garret)
